name: nature-poems
nature-1:
Up the hill and down the road
 ventured the lonesome toad
 he smiled at the wheat and ran past the grain
 finally he was free again
nature-2:
The river flows free
 glistening water
 bugs dance as the birds sing
 this beauty is a marvelous thing
nature-3:
It is mighty. Big and Strong
 It allures the courageous
 it deters the cautious
 The mountain.
nature-4:
The tree atop the hill
 long has it been there
 long will it stay
 I smile.
